name: Skype Button – Add the Skype button for calls/chat on the web.
author: bPlugins

sections.description:
You can easily integrate the Modern Look Skype call/chat Button into your WordPress website using this plugin.

Demos

Features

  • Fully Customizable: You can customize the skype button as per your needs.
  • Responsive: This plugin works on all devices.

How to use

  • First, Install the Skype Button Block plugin
  • Add the Skype Button block from the block category called “Widgets” in the Gutenberg editor.
  • You can change block settings from the right-side settings sidebar.

  • Enjoy!

  • For installation help click on Installation Tab

Feedback

  • Did you like this plugin? Dislike it? Do you have a feature request? Please share your feedback with us

sections.installation:
From Gutenberg Editor:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For Skype Button Block
  3. Click on the Skype Button to add the block

Download & Upload:

  1. Download the Skype Button Block plugin (.zip file)
  2. In your admin area, go to the Plugins menu and click on Add New
  3. Click on Upload Plugin and choose the embed-skype-button.zip file and click on Install Now
  4. Activate the plugin and Enjoy!

Manually:

  1. Download and upload the Skype Button Block plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is Skype Button block free?

Yes, the Skype Button block is a free Gutenberg block plugin.

Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

Can I change block settings?

Yes, you can change block settings from the Gutenberg block editor’s right sidebar.

How many times can I reuse a block?

You can use unlimited times as you want.

Where can I get support?

You can post your questions on the support forum here
